committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 12, 1920 (41 Stat. 596), to allow the city of Pocatello, Idaho, to use certain lands for a correctional facility for women, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Allows the city of Pocatello, Idaho, to use certain public lands, originally transferred to it for the conservation and protection of its water supply, for the construction and operation of a correctional facility for women or for other public purposes. Eliminates the annual reporting requirement on use of the transferred land.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 12, 1920 (41 Stat. 596), to allow the city of Pocatello, Idaho, to use certain lands for a correctional facility for women, and for other purposes.
